text: The BET Award for Best International Act is an award given to honor the outstanding achievements of international artists from around the world every year. ==Winners and nominees== Winners are listed first and highlighted in bold. ===2010s=== {| class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- style="background:#bebebe;" ! style="width:11%;"| Year ! style="width:42%;"| Artist ! style="width:42%;"| Country ! style="width:5%;"| Ref |- | rowspan="13" align="center"| 2018 |- style="background:#B0C4DE" | Davido | Nigeria | rowspan="12" align="center"| |- | Tiwa Savage | Nigeria |- | Distruction Boyz | South Africa |- | Sjava | South Africa |- | Cassper Nyovest | South Africa |- | Stormzy | UK |- | J Hus | UK |- | Stefflon Don | UK |- | Dadju | France |- | Booba | France |- | Niska | France |- | Fally Ipupa | DR Congo |- | rowspan="8" align="center"| 2019 |- style="background:#B0C4DE" | Burna Boy | Nigeria | rowspan="7" align="center"| |- | Mr Eazi | Nigeria |- | Dave | UK |- | Giggs | UK |- | Aya Nakamura | France |- | Dosseh | France |- | AKA | South Africa |- |} ===2020s=== {| class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- style="background:#bebebe;" ! style="width:11%;"| Year ! style="width:42%;"| Artist ! style="width:42%;"| Country ! style="width:5%;"| Ref |- | rowspan="13" align="center"| 2020 |- style="background:#B0C4DE" | Burna Boy | Nigeria | rowspan="12" align="center"|https://www.bet.com/shows/bet-awards/2020/nominees/best- international-act.html |- | Dave | UK |- | Innoss'B | DRC |- | Ninho | France |- | S.Pri Noir | France |- | Sho Madjozi | South Africa |- | Stormzy | UK |} ==References== Category:Awards established in 2018 Category:BET Awards
title: BET Award for Best International Act
